RealFunctionFactory Class Reference
[Helper classes for User Interface classes]

Public Member Functions

virtual RealFunction * createFunction (C4DView *)=0

Detailed Description

Abstract base class for a factory creating Function's.

Separate classes are needed for Functions and Surfaces, because their constructors differ.
